dialogues.text: Hello, agent!
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: Welcome to Crypto Agent.
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: Today, we'll learn about the Caesar Cipher.
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: Great job, agent!
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: You have completed the Caesar Cipher.
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: Now you are ready for your traning!
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: Hello Agent, this is sergeant Mehmet!
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: Agent I was informed that you are able to start the training.
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: Now you are ready for your training!
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: Try to decrypt this message!
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: Okay sir!
dialogues.speaker: mainCharacter

dialogues.text: Okay, I found the message now!
dialogues.speaker: mainCharacter

dialogues.text: Looks like the message is encrypted with the Caesar Cipher.
dialogues.speaker: mainCharacter

dialogues.text: I need to decrypt it.
dialogues.speaker: mainCharacter

dialogues.text: Well done, agent! You completed the training.
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: You can work on other Cryptography topics now.
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: As you can see Agent!
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: Without having the key you can't decrypt a message.
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: The Data Encryption Standard (DES) is another symmetric algorithm!
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: I will explain to you Applications of Symmetric Key Cryptography.
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: First application is Data Encryption.
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: Second application is Secure Communications.
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: Third application is Digital Signatures.
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: Fourth application is Authentication.
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter

dialogues.text: Fifth application is Payment Systems.
dialogues.speaker: otherCharacter
